name: Succor
description:
Life is exhausting, and sometimes it's a surprisingly hard task just to feed yourself when memories lurk wherever you look. 

An introspective interactive fiction game with choice-based decision making and exploration.

There are currently three achivements you can earn in game.

Mobile version is not optimised yet. It'll work, but some text may look funky!

---

Made for Jame Gam #25.

Art: Matthias Speksnijder
